ai-ja219:1.2_0: this is the conversation amongst the day.
ai-ja219:1.3_0: Some people are hard to find—
ai-ja219:1.4_0: the teaching of the noble ones.
ai-ja219:2.2_0: One of the Buddhas would be an impure.
ai-ja219:2.3_0: stuck out from the mango grove.
ai-ja219:2.6_0: let the people come to you.”
